## IStudio.getStudioProject() method

Returns the Theatre.js project that contains the studio's sheets and objects.

It is useful if you'd like to have sheets/objects that are present only when studio is present.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getStudioProject(): IProject;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

IProject
